00008 void
00009 tcp_process_ack_rc(tcp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, tcp_message * M, tw_lp * lp)
00010 {
00011         int             i;
00012         int             ack;
00013 
00014         // printf("%f roll ack %d %d lp %d\n",tw_now(lp), state->unack, M->ack,
00015         // lp->id);
00016 
00017         if (bf->c2)
00018         {
00019                 for (i = 0; i < M->seq_num; i++)
00020                 {
00021                         // tw_rand_reverse_unif(lp->id);
00022                         state->seq_num -= state->mss;
00023                         state->sent_packets--;
00024                 }
00025                 state->lastsent = M->RC.lastsent;
00026 
00027                 // reverse tcp_update_rtt 
00028                 if (bf->c5 || bf->c7)
00029                 {
00030 
00031                         state->rtt_seq = M->RC.rtt_seq;
00032                         // M->RC.rtt_seq = state->rtt_seq;
00033                         // state->rtt_seq = M->ack; // wrong CHANGE
00034                         state->rtt_time = M->RC.rtt_time;
00035 
00036                         if (bf->c6 && bf->c5)
00037                                 state->rto = M->dst;
00038                         state->rto_seq--;
00039 
00040                         if (bf->c13)
00041                         {
00042                                 tcp_message    *M1;
00043                                 rn_message     *msg1;
00044 
00045                                 if (state->timer)
00046                                         tw_timer_reset(lp, &(state->timer), M->RC.timer_ts);
00047                                 else
00048                                         state->timer = tw_timer_init(lp, M->RC.timer_ts);
00049 
00050                                 msg1 = tw_event_data(state->timer);
00051                                 M1 = rn_message_data(msg1);
00052                                 M1->seq_num = M->RC.timer_seq;
00053                                 M1->src = M->src;
00054                                 M1->type = RTO;
00055                         }
00056                 }
00057 
00058 
00059                 // Reverse tcp_update_cwnd
00060                 if (bf->c3 || bf->c4)
00061                         state->cwnd = M->RC.cwnd;
00062 
00063                 ack = state->unack;
00064                 state->unack = M->ack;
00065                 M->ack = ack - state->mss;
00066                 state->dup_count = M->RC.dup_count;
00067                 if (bf->c9)
00068                         state->seq_num = M->RC.seq_num;
00069         } else
00070         {
00071                 if (bf->c3)
00072                 {
00073                         state->dup_count -= 1;
00074                         if (bf->c4)
00075                         {
00076 
00077                                 state->rtt_time = M->RC.rtt_time;
00078                                 state->rtt_seq = M->RC.seq_num; // state->unack; //big CHANGE 
00079                                 // state->timedout_packets--;
00080                                 // state->sent_packets--;
00081 
00082                                 state->rto_seq--;
00083 
00084                                 state->seq_num = M->ack;
00085                                 M->ack = state->unack - state->mss;
00086 
00087                                 state->lastsent = M->RC.lastsent;
00088                                 state->cwnd = M->RC.cwnd;
00089                                 state->ssthresh = M->dst;
00090

00093                                 {
00094                                         tcp_message    *M1;

00111 /*********************************************************************
00112                Receives the processing of data packet
00113 *********************************************************************/
00114 
00115 void
00116 tcp_process_data_rc(tcp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, tcp_message * M, tw_lp * lp)
00117 {
00118         // printf("%f \n", M->RC.lastsent);
00119         if (bf->c2)
00120         {
00121                 // tw_rand_reverse_unif(lp->id);
00122                 state->lastsent = M->RC.lastsent;
00123                 state->received_packets--;
00124                 state->seq_num -= state->mss;
00125                 while (M->RC.dup_count)
00126                 {
00127                         state->out_of_order[(state->seq_num / (int)state->mss) %
00128                                                                 state->recv_wnd] = 1;
00129                         state->seq_num -= state->mss;
00130                         M->RC.dup_count--;
00131                 }
00132         } else
00133         {
00134                 state->lastsent = M->RC.lastsent;
00135                 if (bf->c3)
00136                 {
00137                         if (bf->c4)
00138                         {
00139                         }       // need to think about this one WILL NOT WORK
00140                                 // UNTIL YOU FIX!!!!!
00141                         else
00142                                 state->out_of_order[(M->seq_num / (int)state->mss) %
00143                                                         state->recv_wnd] = 0;
00144                 }
00145         }
00146 }

00149 /*********************************************************************
00150                  Receives the processing of a timeout    
00151 *********************************************************************/
00152 
00153 void
00154 tcp_timeout_rc(tcp_state * state, tw_bf * bf, tcp_message * M, tw_lp * lp)
00155 {
00156         int             ssthresh = M->dst;
00157         int             seq_num = M->ack;
00158 
00159         if (bf->c1)
00160         {
00161                 state->lastsent = M->RC.lastsent;
00162                 state->rtt_time = M->RC.rtt_time;
00163                 state->rtt_seq = M->RC.rtt_seq; // M->seq_num; CHANGE
00164                 state->rto_seq--;
00165                 state->timedout_packets--;
00166                 // state->sent_packets--;
00167 
00168 
00169                 state->rto = M->RC.dup_count;   
00170                 // state->rto/2; //possible an error.
00171                 state->seq_num = seq_num;
00172 
00173                 state->cwnd = M->RC.cwnd;
00174                 state->ssthresh = ssthresh;
00175 
00176                 tw_timer_cancel(lp, &(state->timer));
00177                 state->timer = M->RC.timer;
00178         }
00179 }
